title: Error boundaries and error states
description: Implement error handling throughout the app with error boundaries for component crashes and inline error states for failed API calls. Include retry functionality.
acceptance_criteria: React Error Boundary catches component crashes
Global error page (app/error.tsx) for route errors
ErrorState component for inline API errors
Error message displayed (user-friendly, not stack trace)
Different styling for different error types
implementation_notes: React Query provides error state in hooks
Consider Sentry or similar for error tracking
ApiError class should have user-friendly messages
